patthana18.14:4.1: Sappaccayaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappaccayo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.14:5.1: Sappaccayaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappaccayo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.14:6.1: Anidassanaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassano nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.14:6.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.14:7.1: Anidassanaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassano nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.14:8.1: Appaṭighaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.14:8.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.14:9.1: Appaṭighaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasappaṭigho nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.14:10.1: Arūpiṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naarūpī nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.14:10.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.14:11.1: Rūpiṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpī nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.14:12.1: Arūpiṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naarūpī nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.14:12.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … purejāte āsevane ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.14:13.1: Lokiyaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nalokuttaro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.14:14.1: Lokuttaraṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nalokuttaro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.14:14.4: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate cattāri.
patthana18.14:15.1: Lokiyaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nalokuttaro nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.14:16.1: Lokuttaraṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nalokiyo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ ….
patthana18.14:17.1: Kenaci viññeyyaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.14:18.1: Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanakenaci viññeyyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.14:19.1: Kenaci viññeyyaṃ hetuñca nakenaci viññeyyaṃ hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.14:20.1: Kenaci viññeyyaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
